title: Exploring the Future of Web Development
excerpt: A quick look at modern tools shaping the future of the web.

body.raw:
# The Future of Web Dev ðŸš€

The web is moving fast. Here are some exciting trends:

1. **Next.js 14** with the new app router.
2. **React Server Components** for faster rendering.
3. **MDX blogs** like this one.

> _The best way to predict the future is to build it._
